author: Galani, BRT
adress: Univ Ngaoundere, Dept Biol Sci, Lab Appl Biochem, Fac Sci, POB 454, Ngaoundere, Cameroon
title: Hepatoprotective Activity of Leptadenia hastata (Asclepiadaceae) on Acetaminophen-Induced Toxicity in Mice: In Vivo Study and Characterization of Bioactive Compounds through Molecular Docking Approaches
